channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 3/04/2025 # New Features and Improvements # MMS now correctly displays images in the conversation window. Fixed timestamp errors caused by daylight saving time adjustments. Fixed an issue where phone numbers were required to start with a “+”. 2/27/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Displayed MegaSend count in the list. Added timestamp logging for label matching. Fixed an issue where the contact field no longer checks for case sensitivity.
